thread.title: Shirtless Tongan Flag-Bearer Qualifies for Pyeongchang Olympics

author: Joshua Robinson
title: Shirtless Tongan Flag-Bearer Qualifies for Pyeongchang Olympics
text:
The shirtless Tongan flag-bearer is going to need some warmer clothes.
Pita Taufatofua, a taekwondoka from a Polynesian island nation who marched into Rioâ€™s opening ceremony glistening in coconut oil and who had never been on skis before last year, qualified for the Pyeongchang Olympics as a cross-country skier on Saturday morning with a...
